original_text: And he shall take some of the blood of the bull and sprinkle it with his finger on the front of the mercy seat on the east side, and in front of the mercy seat he shall sprinkle some of the blood with his finger seven times.
korean_text: 그는 또 수송아지의 피를 가져다가 손가락으로 속죄소 동쪽에 뿌리고 또 손가락으로 그 피를 속죄소 앞에 일곱 번 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall take some of the blood of the bull
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 수소의 피를 조금 가져와야 하며

sentences.original_text: and sprinkle it with his finger
on the front of the mercy seat
and in front of the mercy seat
he shall sprinkle some of the blood
